title: Plumbing permits
dataVerified: Licensed plumber, property address, plumbing work scope, inspection
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Permit status (issued/final inspection passed). Link to building department system (plumbers and public, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents unlicensed plumbing work. Domain binding verifies plumbing inspector. Health code compliance. Prevents water damage liability. Cross-connection control.
